price: Dijeron [los guardias]: "¿Cuál debería ser el castigo de quien esté mintiendo?"
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
